ygData.messageBody:
>Any how. I have a feeling blacksmithing is broke. My skill is 126 or
>somewhere near there. I can make all items with only a few failures. (I
>hate legs though, seem to fail a lot.)
>I have made well over 100 pieces of armor over the past couple of weeks, and
>have not seen a single point of skill increase. I didn't have any problem
>getting skill up to 126 making all the standard stuff, then I start making
>armor, and I get nothing. My Int is about average 86. I'm thinking that
>getting skill from making armor is broke. Has anyone else seen this? Also,
>I know some armor items are trivial, and I know I'm not making a ton of
>trivial armor items. I've made plenty of legs, mails, cloaks, mantles, etc.
>

Well I can't say if making the armor is broke for skill gains, but if you
want to get your skill up a bit higher to increase your success rate try
making some Sweing Kits. They don't trivial till 135.
